message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its advanced features and exceptional quality, it's truly a game-changer in its field. I believe its value exceeds $12000, but I'm willing to start our negotiation at this generous offer: $15000. Let me know if you're interested in discussing further.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $12000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and other similar products in the industry.
